photoUploader.title: ğŸ“¸ Upload Your Players' Photos
photoUploader.description: Upload between 2 and 16 photos of your players. The file names will be used as player names.

photoUploader.maxPhotosWarning: You tried to upload more than 16 photos, only the first 16 selected photos will be uploaded.
